name: ROGLE
description:
ROGLE is the classic game of Wordle with a mix of rogue-like elements, that increases in difficulty as you succeed. As you play, you will gain abilities that will increase your chances of finding the word while the wordle gets harder to solve and you challenge enemies that will attempt to stop you.

Classic wordle gameplay:
You enter in a word and see, based on the colors, how correct you are. Test your vocabulary or perhaps learn new words as you play!

Rogue-Like:
As you correctly guess words you will be able to select abilities that will aid you as the game progressively gets harder. How far can you go!
